article_title: Gruber: 'There Are Democrats And There Are Stupid People'
article_text:
Economist Jonathan Gruber speaks at a conference of the Workers Compensation Research Institute in Boston, Massachusetts, March 12, 2014. Dr. Gruber is a professor at MIT and the architect of the healthcare reform laws in Massachusetts and the American Affordable Care Act. REUTERS/Dominick Reuter (UNITED STATES - Tags: POLITICS BUSINESS HEADSHOT) - RTR3GTIP

4435881

Obamacare architect Jonathan Gruber infamously discussed the “stupidity” of the American people. Now we know which kinds of voters he was specifically referring to.

Gruber was the first one quoted in the 2008 Boston Globe obituary of his former MIT political science professor Louis Menand III. What did Gruber remember about Menand?

“He would say in class, ‘There are two types of people: There are Democrats and there are stupid people,'” Gruber said. (RELATED: Gruber: The Affordable Care Act Will NOT Be Affordable)

Follow Patrick on Twitter

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Patrick Howley
article_metadata.description: Jonathan Gruber reminisces about his college days
